content.html: I talk about systems, structures, stereotypes, beliefs, ideas, global problems, oppression, & abuse. My critics talk about my appearance, my background, my personal life & gossip. We are on two different levels, and at two very different stages in our personal development.
content.value:
I talk about systems, structures, stereotypes, beliefs, ideas, global problems, oppression, & abuse.

My critics talk about my appearance, my background, my personal life & gossip.

We are on two different levels, and at two very different stages in our personal development.
